org.jcouchdb.document
Class DocumentHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.jcouchdb.document.DocumentHelper

public class DocumentHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class that reflectively gets and sets the "_id" and "_rev" properties of documents, obeying JSONProperty annotations.

Author:
shelmberger
